ipxact:localMemoryMap.ipxact:name: pic_timer_mem_map
ipxact:localMemoryMap.ipxact:description: AHB-Lite PIC and Timer memory map

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: cnt_l
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lower 32 bits of 64-bit timer counter register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: cnt_h
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Higher 32 bits of 64-bit timer counter register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: cmp_l
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lower 32 bits of 64-bit timer compare register

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: cmp_h
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Higher 32 bits of 64-bit timer compare register

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: ICACHE_RANGE_LOW
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Instruction Cache Cacheable Address Range Lower Limit (32'h00000000 ~ 32'hFFFFFFFF)

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: ICACHE_RANGE_HIGH
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Instruction Cache Cacheable Address Range Higher Limit (32'h00000000 ~ 32'hFFFFFFFF)

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DCACHE_RANGE_LOW
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Data Cache Cacheable Address Range Lower Limit (32'h00000000 ~ 32'hFFFFFFFF)

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DCACHE_RANGE_HIGH
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:displayName: Data Cache Cacheable Address Range Higher Limit (32'h00000000 ~ 32'hFFFFFFFF)
